links.title: Triple Bottomed, Bulls are alive!
links.description: Good evening traders, Join my discord group https://discord.gg/aPrcCjm many people made more than 2k today on this crazy market turnaround today on the callouts! As you know, we triple bottomed and is departing away from 2620 to the area of 2720s. I am closely monitoring apple on a potential upside to $184.

links.title: Tesla competitive advantage: Why Tesla and Apple are so very similar
links.description: Tesla is a first-mover in the EV industry. However, many analysts are uncertain whether this is sufficient in the long run. In order to become the most compelling car company of the 21st century, Tesla will have to come up with a source of sustainable competitive advantage.

links.title: The Dow just slashed a 785-point plunge, marking its most stunning reversal since March
links.description: By Think of it as a turnaround Thursday. The Dow Jones Industrial Average staged an epic intraday rally that wiped out 705 points of losses to cap a wild session. The reversal was the blue-chip index's most stunning-between the Dow's 11:30 a.m.
